comment: Prepare to not get your grades back until about a month after you submit the test. That also includes your final grade. He's an okay guy and super easy but really disorganized.

Honestly my favorite professor. Pretty unorganized and hard to get in contact with since he is a neuropsychologist (never responds to email) and has a family, but it all works out in the end. He realizes his actions and will make a test open-note or what not to make up for it. He is amazing in lecture.I found a new love for psychology thanks to him
GREAT TEACHER!!! he KNOWS and LOVES the material. He's a little unorganized when it comes to grading and handing back work but he's super easy. Show up and you'll definitely get an A+
Dr. Warshowsky is extremely funny and interesting. Class is never dull. Tests are straight forward and easy if you study the material.

This class was a joke and super easy. I studied a few hours before each test and got an A on all of them. He is extremely unorganized, but he keeps class interesting and gives all kinds of extra points. If you really want to learn material, then this class may not be for you, but if you want an easy A, then take this class!

Funny guy. If you can handle a very laid back, disorganized professor, he is your guy.  Good teacher, fun lecturer. Just know he has major ADD and forgets things a lot. But I would take him again for sure!

Awesome professor- added relevant information to the lectures, rather than just reading from a Powerpoint. Very easygoing, funny, willing to help. Sometimes hard to get in touch with quickly, but that is understandable as he is also a practicing Neuropsychologist. If you must take Physio, take it with him!
Great personality. His tests are straight forward, and mostly from his PPTs. A couple of questions from class lectures.  Attendance is not mandatory, but helps. Take him, you won't regret it.
He is very easy going, a great guy to listen to and look at. He is extremely fair and wants everyone to do well. Take him you won't regret it.
